title: Page Structure
content:
# Page Structure

2022-07-03 18:44

The page structure is defined by he `.axml` file in the `pages` directory, the content should follow the `axml` syntax.

AXML is similar to HTML, and there are also some differences, please refer to [AXML](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/framework_axml-reference_axml-introduction) for more detail information.
